======================================================================
Analysis Notes:
======================================================================
1. Encryption time grows linearly with message size
   (each character is encrypted independently)
2. Ciphertext size = message_length × 128 bytes
   (each character becomes a 1024-bit encrypted value)
3. Ciphertext expansion factor ≈ 128×
   (1 byte plaintext → 128 bytes ciphertext)
